New Records: Kohli equals Sachin Tendulkar's record for most ODI centuries (49)
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma remarked that India's performance showed they are getting better and adapting to situations
Virat Kohli expressed that the game was more special because it was his birthday and that he enjoyed playing cricket again
South Africa captain Temba Bavuma acknowledged that India's performance was challenging and that they need to adapt their skills accordingly
Miscellaneous Highlights: India bowled out South Africa for 83, a new record in a World Cup match
Kuldeep Yadav takes a five-wicket haul in the match
